about_the_game:
Welcome strangers and local folk as a keeper of a bar in a small port town called Strandcliff.
Listen to their stories. Collect and connect information you gather. Find out the ties, that chain the whole town. And see if you can untie the mystery behind your own life.

  • Uncover secrets behind mysterious murders,
  • List the crew of people to find sunken treasure,
  • Help local orphans or make them suffer even more,
  • Side with the law or criminal gangs, or stay neutral,
  • Try help everyone, or ruin their lives.

Use all the information you gather to implore your patrons to do stuff for you advantage or to help them change their lives for better or worse. Make friends and enemies. Manage your bar, hire people, offer accommodation, buy goods, find stuff lost by your patrons, keep it and use it or try selling it.

This is your bar, you are the master here.

Three protagonists and more than a dozen of characters await you. Their fate fully depends on your choices. But be ware, as helping one, might ruin other.

Now pour some wishlists to our glass to change the fate of Strandcliff!

content_descriptors.notes:
Alcohol consumption. Hey what did you expected from a game about a bar?
Might also contain sexual themes (no nudity though, trust us you wouldn't wish to see those polygons), some drug mention and strong language in text form.

Some pirate language is possible as well, YARRR.

short_description: A detective game where you fiddle information to your advantage. As an owner of a small bar, listen to visitors of your establishment, overhear their gossiping, collect information and then use to manipulate their thoughts and actions.
